title: Patti LuPone stuns Broadway as The Apologizer
description: On Instagram, Patti LuPone apologized after 500 Broadway artists asked her to stop bullying her fellow artists. The post Patti LuPone stuns Broadway as The Apologizer appeared first on AV Club.
author: Matt Schimkowitz

title: Court is now in session for Saul Goodman V. Jimmy McGill in exclusive book excerpt
description: Author Alan Sepinwall talks to series co-creator Peter Gould in this excerpt from The Complete Critical Companion To Better Call Saul. The post Court is now in session for Saul Goodman V. Jimmy McGill in exclusive book excerpt appeared first on AV Club.
author: Jen Lennon

title: Crunchyroll Winter 2023 Simulcast Slate Offers Largest Line-Up Yet

title: Superman & Lois, James Gunn/DCU, Sandman & More: BCTV Daily Dispatch

title: Is High Potential’s Budding Romance Already Doomed in Season 2?
description: Morgan Gillory’s latest relationship could already be over before it even got off the ground. Janitor-turned-nurse Tom charmed his way into Morgan’s heart in the first season of High Potential, but with actor JD Pardo’s recent casting as a series regular on Netflix’s Trinity, the potential for a relationship between Morgan and Tom has become, […]
author: Andy Swift

title: What to Watch This Week: 40+ Premieres, Finales and More
description: To help you anticipate and navigate all that television has to offer across broadcast, cable and streaming, TVLine offers daily, weekly and monthly What to Watch digests, as well as an overview of every new TV show premiering in 2025. This week, you’ll find 15 series premieres (including The Institute and Untamed), 11 returning series […]
author: Ryan Schwartz
